items.title: Deadly US winter storm leaves flights delayed and thousands without power
items.description: At least a dozen people have died in multiple US states possibly due to the storm, officials have said.

items.title: Trump raises US tariffs on South Korea imports to 25%
items.description: Trump has accused Seoul of "not living up" to a trade deal that was reached last year.

items.title: India and EU announce landmark trade deal
items.description: The long-awaited deal comes as both Delhi and Brussels contend with economic and geopolitical pressure from the US.

items.title: Immigration chief at centre of Trump's crackdown set to leave Minneapolis
items.description: The US president is sending border tsar Tom Homan to the city in an apparent shift in tone from the White House.

items.title: Nipah virus outbreak in India triggers Asia airport screenings
items.description: Airports in Thailand and Nepal have begun screening passengers from West Bengal.
